preferences.name: creativity
preferences.title: Creativity

preferences.name: openaiApiToken
preferences.title: OpenAI API Token
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API Token. Required if you choose ChatGPT as your AI.

preferences.name: language
preferences.title: Language

preferences.title: Maximum Characters
preferences.description: What is the maximum number of characters for the summary? Higher means more detail, but could exceed token limit for further summarization.

data.title: Medium (~2000 tokens, best for Raycast AI)
